function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Implementation of restrictions around urban green spaces leading to complaints from drivers and traffic accidents","Impact":"Increased risk of conflict and accidents in surrounding areas","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough impact assessments and engage with local authorities and stakeholders to address concerns","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping tools to assess traffic flow and potential conflict areas","People":"Car drivers, pedestrians, park users","Owner":"Municipal authorities, park managers"},{"Description":"Vandalism of yellow ribbons used to enclose restricted areas","Impact":"Compromised restriction measures and potential safety hazards","Mitigation":"Use alternative methods of marking restricted areas or increase surveillance and security measures","Technologies":"Surveillance cameras, motion sensors, smart fencing systems","People":"Park personnel, local police, park users","Owner":"Park management, local authorities"},{"Description":"Evasion of restrictions by young people during nights","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and non-compliance with safety measures","Mitigation":"Implement nighttime surveillance patrols and community engagement to raise awareness and promote compliance","Technologies":"Surveillance drones, community engagement platforms","People":"Young people, local residents","Owner":"Park management, local police"}]}
